name: Topics in Emerging Scholarship (Evolutionary Anthropology)
description: Taught by an advanced PhD student or postdoctoral fellow, and based on his or her doctoral research and area of expertise, this course presents a unique opportunity to explore intensively a particular Evolutionary Anthropology topic in-depth. Topics vary from year to year.
prerequisites: ANT203Y1 and 0.5 FCE 300+ Group B (Evolutionary) course
